channel.title: Rune2007 Remake!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JwsZW.png[/img]
Hello everyone!
I've recently started a project on recreating Runescape in the year of 2007 I'm looking for (Web Designer / Source Coders-Java)
I have a webhost already.
I also have all the files to create a webpage but I am unfamiliar with HTML/PHP.
Misc Information
All Dupes Fixed 90% Npc Spawns Perfect Combat Perfect Switching Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Music ( All areas have music, Working on making it switch when walking into a new area) 317 Loading 377 Christmas Cracker w/ Pull Duel Arena Tzhaar Caves Castle Wars Pest Control Barrows Fight Pits Warriors Guild Ect.. Much more.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yGlwD.png[/img] When the time comes i will get vps for host, but for now the server is still under construction, message me via moparscape or @ Jessel3393@msn.com on Msn Messenger/Windows Live for more information.
Tell me in a post below some information about yourself / you're experience feild and why you want to join this development team.
